title: 24 boxes, no keys
body:
Hi, I'm just wondering why I keep getting boxes but never get keys.  I currently have 24 boxes and only two key fragments.  I've been quiet about this for a long time, but at 24 boxes and no keys I'd like a little explaination on this please. :) 

Thanks

replies.body:
Looking at your recent history, you might have just obtained all the key fragments you can get in a short period of time. There's a small cap on how many you can rack up in a 4 week period.

https://i.gyazo.com/b9184b219fc5ac5a9cf6541e38e73193.png
I only play ARAMs so I have 20 complete keys and no boxes. I'd gladly swap some with you if there was a way! :)
